messages.message:
Hi, We are moving the aihub apps development work from UAT to Dev environment. We were thinking of downloading the aihub folder from UAT account and replace it on the dev env so that all of the builder/refiner/flow starts working as it is. But looks like there’s a limit on the number of files which can be zipped into a folder and we can’t download and move the entire folder. Do we have any other idea in mind for copying over the entire content from UAT to Dev or it has to be done separately for each folder?
cc: @Balaram @avi
cc: @Heymian @shaunak do you have any suggestions?
firstly just downloading the AI Hub project folders won’t be enough since the projects won’t exist in the dev environment databases

the only things directly portable across environments are
1. refiners
2. flows

if you want to port an AI Hub project, i’d recommend that you create a new project in the dev environment -> then copy over the `documents` folder and `chats.json` file from the project folder in the UAT environment into the new project folder in the dev environment

i’m not entirely sure this will work since i haven’t tried this myself, so let us know if you run into issues
@Shubham @Saumya, should we start by trying this for one app in this case? If it works, we can move the remaining
